description: This Kotlin source file defines the NotesAdapter class, a RecyclerView adapter responsible for displaying a list of notes in an Android application. It manages the creation and binding of view holders for individual notes, handles item click interactions, and optimizes list updates through diffing logic.

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of notes, utilizing DiffUtil for efficient updates.

classes.name: NotesAdapter.NoteVH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that binds a Note object to the UI components within each list item.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of the NoteVH view holder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a Note object to the view holder at a specific position.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Associates a Note object's data with the view components in the view holder.
